question: Which shopping facility, noted for its brutalist style, is situated on Masarykovo square in Jihlava, Czech Republic?
asked_question_translated: Kateri nakupovalni objekt v brutalističnem slogu se nahaja na Masarykovem trgu v Jihlavi na Češkem?
answer: Nakupovalni objekt v brutalističnem slogu na Masarykovem trgu v Jihlavi na Češkem je Trgovski dom (Obchodní dům).
answer_translated_eng: The brutalist-style shopping building on Masaryk Square in Jihlava, Czech Republic, is the Obchodní dům (Market House).
